prereq.p: If required, apply the considerations checklist for new asset purchase. Refer to the Asset Mangement Process. This process covers changes to hardware or software infrastructure.

step.cmd: Identify a hardware change through the Weekly Roadmap Meeting.
Gather requirements and procure hardware as necessary or allocated virtual resources needed.

step.note:
The ticket may progress through the following:
list of changes
test plan
rollout plan
backup/backout plan
step.cmd: Open a ticket to track project.
Once project is complete, close and archive the ticket.
